Package com.bizosys.hsearch.filter

Interface Summary
IStorable The interface implemented to serialize the object to byte array
 

Class Summary
Access Currently access can be set by defining combination of uid team role org unit orgunit + uid orgunit + role TODO:: Allow the regular expression here.
AccessStorable Store the accesses in a byte serializable list
AMFilterCommon Match the Meta and ACL section of document
AMFilterMerged This is a document specific filter gets applied in matching terms.
AMFilterSingular This is a document specific filter gets applied in matching terms.
AMMarker  
FilterIds Finds out whether a document carries the matching term hash, document type and term type restricting it inside allowed merged sections (buckets).
FilterObjectFactory  
MergedBlocks

TeaserFilterCommon.WordPosition Carries sighting information of a word inside the content
